entry.title: MiracleJames/To-Do-App: A lightweight TODO list app with backend logic built using Flask (or Node.js). It supports task creation, deletion, and live updates.
entry.content: A lightweight TODO list app with backend logic built using Flask (or Node.js). It supports task creation, deletion, and live updates.

entry.title: neuroborus/ethers-tools: ethers-tools is a zero-dependency lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library built on top of ethers.js designed to simplify smart contract interactions and multicall3 aggregation on the Ethereum blockchain and compatible EVM networks.
entry.content: ethers-tools is a zero-dependency lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library built on top of ethers.js designed to simplify smart contract interactions and multicall3 aggregation on the Ethereum blockchain and compatible EVM networks.

entry.title: topghostly/glyph-cms: Glyph CMS is a lightweight, API-driven CMS for creating and managing blog content with a rich text editor. It provides structured JSON output, supports images, lists, and links, and offers an optional pre-styled component library for easy integration. 🚀
entry.content: Glyph CMS is a lightweight, API-driven CMS for creating and managing blog content with a rich text editor. It provides structured JSON output, supports images, lists, and links, and offers an optional pre-styled component library for easy integration. 🚀

entry.title: ShaAnder/Ping_Me_Backend: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests
entry.content: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests
